pkgmetadata.longdescription: Removing Allometric Effects of Body Size in Morphological Analysis // Implementation of the technique of Lleonart et al. (2000) doi:10.1006/jtbi.2000.2043 to scale body measurements that exhibit an allometric growth. This procedure is a theoretical generalization of the technique used by Thorpe (1975) doi:10.1111/j.1095-8312.1975.tb00732.x and Thorpe (1976) doi:10.1111/j.1469-185X.1976.tb01063.x.
